Articles.Content:
.The Bug

The camera just drifts behind the rocket while im launching it.

 

Mods That I Used:

Spoiler

Active Texture Management - Compresses Textures For Less Memory Usage

Surface Experiment Pack - Pack Of Science Experiments For KIS

Atomic Age - More Nuclear Engines

Better Time Warp - Faster Time Warp And Slow Motion

DMagic Orbital Science - Cool Pack Of Science Experiments

FTL Drive - FTL Drive System That Uses A Beacon System For FTL Travel (You Have To First Go There And Setup A Beacon And Then You Can Use The FTL Drive To Get There)

Hooligan Labs - Airship Parts

KAS - Kerbal Attachment System - EVA Pipes And Ropes

Kerbal Engineer - Delta-V Calculator

Kerbal Foundries - Wheels, Tracks And Hover Craft Parts

KIS - Kerbal Inventory System - Inventorys For Kerbals On EVA Or On Ship Containers

Kopernicus - Planet Making/Editing Plugin

Magic Smoke Industries - Legacy and Rework Utility Pack - For Moving Parts And Robotics

Mech Jeb 2 - Autopilot

Modular Rocket Systems - Stockalike Parts For Rockets

Final Frontier - Adds Badges To Kerbals That Have Gone To Space Or A Planet First Or Other Things Thay Done

Outer Planets - Adds New Planets To The Outer Solar System Using Kopernicus

Deep Freeze Continued - Freezing Chamber For Kerbals To Not Consume Life Support Resources

Scan Sat - Parts For Mapping Surfaces Of Planets Or Moons

Ship Manifest - Systems For Space Crafts Like Dumping Resources Or Refueling If Landed On Kerbin's Surface

Smoke Screen - Custom Particles Plugin

Texture Replacer - Custom Texture Replacement And Other Cool Stuff Like IVA Suits In Breathable Atmosphere

Trans-Keptunian - Adds Trans-Neptunian Like Objects To The Outer Solar System

USI Exploration Pack - Parts For Exploration Of Planets Or Moons

USI Karibou Rover - Parts For A Kolonization Rover

USI Kolonization - Parts For Kolonization Of Planets, Moons Or Orbits (Space Stations)

USI Kontainers - Kontainers For Transporting Kolonization Resources

USI Life Support - Life Support System

USI Reactor Pack - Nuclear Reactors For Bases Or Space Stations

USI Survival Pack - Adds Parts Like Escape Pods, Floats And Airbags

Universal Storage - A Cool Storage System For Parts, Life Support Resources And Science Experiments

OSE Workshop - In-Situ Part Crafting For KIS

Module Manager - Editing Parts Without Having To Edit The Actual Config Of That Part

Also I Have A Probe Docked Inside The Cargo Bay.

Thanks.

Edited January 1, 2016 by alex_1313
And how did you do it? Other might have this problem too.

7 hours ago, *Aqua* said:

And how did you do it? Other might have this problem too.

It was the old version of community resource pack, i updated it and now the camera doesn't drift off the rocket.

The orbital survay scanners just get destroyed and the camera was drifting off the rocket.

Edited January 2, 2016 by alex_1313
